attributes.additional_details: Many local bars, restaurants, pubs, cinemas. , clubs, music venues and entertainment venues are all struggling to make ends meet. The government has offered very little support for this sector that actually employs a large number of very passionate people
attributes.background: Reverse the decisions that were implemented Monday and admit the spikes are less to do with “young people“ and more to do with everyone going back to work / college and the “help out to eat out” scheme
